Text:
Error playing between 1 hour 49 minutes and 11 seconds and 1 hour 49 minutes and 18 seconds.
(1:49:11 - 1:49:18) But luckily them 7 seconds weren't important whatsoever. Other than that the torrent was brilliant.
Aside from that slight glitch that I had (May only be me that gets this error) I'd give audio and video both a 10/10.

Thanks for a great torrent my friend. =D
hmm. No problem I didn't notice the glitch when I watched it.
